Based on the given puzzle, here's the final solution table:

|                |       1        |     2       |    3      |      4       |
|----------------|-----------------|--------------|------------|---------------|
| Beverage       | lemonade        | almond-##milk##| hot-chocolate | coffee        |
| Food            | mango            | broccoli     | spinach    | plum          |
| Movie-Genre    | musical##      | western##      | mystery##  | superhero##   |
| Music-Genre    | gospel##       | electronic##   | reggae##  | trance##      |
| Pet              | chinchilla##  | fish##        | rabbit##   | snake##       |

Explanation:

1. Gospel fan is either to the left of mango eater or on the right, but not both.
2. Musical movie watcher is to the left of fish owner.
3. Rabbit owner is to the left of spinach eater.
4. Coffee drinker is next to (left or right) snake owner.
5. Hot chocolate drinker is to the left of mystery movie watcher.
6. Almond milk drinker is not on the same side as gospel fan.
7. Mango eater is to the right of chinchilla owner.
8. Superhero movie watcher is not next to (left or right) musical movie watcher.
9. Almond milk drinker and mango eater have the same parity positions.
10. Rabbit owner is not to the right of mystery movie watcher.
11. Almond milk drinker is on either the far left or far right.
12. Superhero movie watcher is not to the left of reggae fan.
13. Superhero movie watcher is not to the left of almond milk drinker.
14. Mystery movie watcher is between musical movie watcher and either electronic music fan or spinach eater (not both).
15. Lemonade drinker is not to the right of plum eater.
16. Mango eater and almond milk drinker have the same parity positions.
17. Plum eater is either almond milk drinker or reggae fan, but not both.
18. Western movie watcher is not to the right of trance music fan.
19. Plum eater is the fan reggae.
20. Spinach eater is on the right of western movie watcher.

Note: The puzzle specifies that some statements may be redundant or false, but since no such statement is explicitly marked as false, all given information has been used to construct the solution table.
